title: New: Dauss – Cycle Points
content:
Although not a household name in electronic music, Dauss’s new gem Cycle Points put him up there with the best.

A real ‘head-bobber’ if I ever heard one, the atmosphere is intense yet brooding, far more intelligent and much less abrasive than the vast majority of up-and-coming producers dominating the current scene. Drawing from the likes of Pantha Du Prince and Bonobo, Dauss may still be finding his feet, but Cycle Points is certainly worth clinging onto for the moment.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
